channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Indigenous women continue to face barriers to breast cancer care, report finds

item.description: A man with a shotgun and a loaded handgun in his vehicle was arrested.

item.title: Warren Buffett Is Generating an Annual Yield of 33% to 60% From 3 Magnificent Stocks -- Here's His Simple Secret to Outsize Yields
Pilot killed, passenger injured in small plane crash in Savannah, Georgia
item.description: A plane crash in Savannah, Georgia, on Sunday left the small aircraft's pilot dead and a passenger injured, officials said.

item.title: Russia rolled out a Soviet howitzer from the 1940s that Moscow technically shouldn't have in the first place

item.title: Lilly Ledbetter, equal pay icon, dead at 86
item.description: Lilly Ledbetter, a champion of women getting paid the same as men for doing the same work, has died, her family said in a statement. She was 86.

item.title: A new caregiver calculator reveals the high cost of caring for loved ones
item.description: How much is your caregiving worth? A new tool calculates the financial value of work devoted to aiding loved ones in need.

item.title: Here's what's open and closed on Columbus Day/Indigenous Peoples Day
item.description: Columbus Day, also known as Indigenous Peoples Day, is a federal holiday. Here's what is open and closed on October 14.

item.title: Israel-Gaza-Lebanon live updates: At least 3 killed in IDF strike on Gaza hospital
item.description: The Israel Defense Forces continued intense air and ground campaigns against Hezbollah in Lebanon and against Hamas in the Gaza Strip.
